channel.title: market efficiency on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in market efficiency on FinanClub

item.title: EBAY
item.description: score:567 Chances: The digital payment giant’s transaction take rates are still declining. A single quarter could be worth more than $200 – and it has nothing to do with inflation. Companies are cutting staff and focusing on efficiency amid a commitment to do more with less following a year of widespread layoffs.
